            height: 30px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .modal-close:hover {
            color: var(--error-color);
        }

        .modal-body {
            padding: 24px;
        }

        .modal-tabs {
            display: flex;
            gap: 4px;
            margin-bottom: 24px;
            border-bottom: 2px solid var(--border-secondary);
        }

        .modal-tab {
            padding: 8px 16px;
            background: transparent;
            border: none;
            border-bottom: 2px solid transparent;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            font-family: inherit;
            margin-bottom: -2px;
        }

        .modal-tab.active {
            color: var(--accent-primary);
            border-bottom-color: var(--accent-primary);
        }

        .modal-tab:hover {
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }

        .modal-tab-content {
            display: none;
        }

        .modal-tab-content.active {
            display: block;
        }

        .form-group {
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }

        .form-group label {
            display: block;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }

        .form-group input[type="text"],
        .form-group input[type="url"],
        .form-group textarea {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 8px 12px;
            border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
            background: var(--bg-primary);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            font-size: 14px;
            font-family: 'SF Mono', 'Monaco', 'Inconsolata', 'Roboto Mono', monospace;
        }

        .form-group textarea {
            min-height: 200px;
            resize: vertical;
        }

        .form-group input[type="file"] {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 8px;
            border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
            background: var(--bg-primary);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            font-size: 14px;
            cursor: pointer;
        }

        .form-hint {
            font-size: 12px;
            color: var(--text-muted);
            margin-top: 4px;
        }

        .form-actions {
            display: flex;
            gap: 12px;
            justify-content: flex-end;
            margin-top: 24px;
            padding-top: 24px;
            border-top: 1px solid var(--border-secondary);
        }

        .btn-cancel {
            padding: 8px 16px;
            background: transparent;
            border: 1px solid var(--border-primary);
            color: var(--text-primary);
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-family: inherit;
        }

        .btn-cancel:hover {
            background: var(--bg-primary);
        }

        .btn-submit {
            padding: 8px 16px;
            background: var(--accent-primary);
            border: 1px solid var(--accent-primary);
            color: white;
            cursor: pointer;
            font-size: 14px;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-family: inherit;
        }

        .btn-submit:hover {
            background: var(--accent-hover);
            border-color: var(--accent-hover);
        }

        .btn-submit:disabled {
            opacity: 0.5;
            cursor: not-allowed;
        }

        .idl-preview {
            margin-top: 24px;
            padding: 16px;
            background: var(--bg-tertiary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-secondary);
        }

        .idl-preview h3 {
            font-size: 14px;
            margin: 0 0 12px 0;
            color: var(--text-primary);
        }

        .idl-stats {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(150px, 1fr));
            gap: 12px;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
        }

        .idl-stat {
            padding: 8px;
            background: var(--bg-secondary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-secondary);
        }

        .idl-stat-label {
            font-size: 11px;
            color: var(--text-muted);
            text-transform: uppercase;
        }

        .idl-stat-value {
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: var(--accent-primary);
        }

        .idl-code {
            background: var(--bg-primary);
            border: 1px solid var(--border-secondary);
            padding: 12px;
            font-family: 'SF Mono', 'Monaco', 'Inconsolata', 'Roboto Mono', monospace;
            font-size: 12px;
            overflow-x: auto;
            max-height: 300px;
            overflow-y: auto;
        }

        .error-message {
            padding: 12px;
            background: var(--error-color);
            color: white;
            border-radius: 4px;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
            font-size: 14px;
        }

        .success-message {
            padding: 12px;
            background: #2da44e;
            color: white;
            border-radius: 4px;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
            font-size: 14px;
        }

        .loading {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
            color: var(--text-secondary);
            font-size: 14px;
        }
    </style>
</head>

<body>
    <div class="container">
        <div class="header">
            <div class="header-content">
                <div class="header-left">
                    <div>
                        <h1>idlhub.com - Solana IDL Registry</h1>
                        <p>A comprehensive collection of Interface Definition Language files for Solana protocols</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
                <div class="header-actions">
                    <button class="bookmark-btn" id="addIdlBtn" title="Add new IDL to registry">
                        <span>â• Add IDL</span>
                    </button>
                    <a href="docs.html" class="bookmark-btn" style="text-decoration: none; display: inline-flex; align-items: center; gap: 6px;">
                        <span>API</span>
                    </a>
                    <button class="bookmark-btn" id="copyRulesBtn" title="Copy instructions for AI agents">
                        <span>ğŸ“‹ Copy Rules</span>
                    </button>
                    <div class="theme-selector">
                        <button class="theme-btn" id="themeBtn">
                            <span id="themeBtnText">Theme</span>
                        </button>
                        <div class="theme-dropdown" id="themeDropdown">
                            <div class="theme-option" data-theme="light">Light</div>
                            <div class="theme-option" data-theme="monokai-light">Monokai Light</div>
                            <div class="theme-option" data-theme="solarized-light">Solarized Light</div>
                            <div class="theme-option" data-theme="dark">Dark</div>
                            <div class="theme-option" data-theme="solarized">Solarized Dark</div>
                            <div class="theme-option" data-theme="night">Night</div>
                            <div class="theme-option" data-theme="dracula">Dracula</div>
                            <div class="theme-option" data-theme="nord">Nord</div>
                            <div class="theme-option" data-theme="onedark">One Dark</div>
                            <div class="theme-option" data-theme="terminal">Terminal</div>
                            <div class="theme-option" data-theme="dos">DOS / Borland</div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <button class="bookmark-btn" id="showBookmarksBtn">
                        <span id="bookmarkBtnText">Bookmarks</span>
                        <span id="bookmarkCount" style="display: none;"></span>
                    </button>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="stats">
                <div class="stat">
                    <div class="stat-number" id="totalProtocols">-</div>
                    <div class="stat-label">Total Protocols</div>
                </div>
                <div class="stat">
                    <div class="stat-number" id="availableProtocols">-</div>
                    <div class="stat-label">IDLs Available</div>
                </div>
                <div class="stat">
                    <div class="stat-number" id="selectedCount">0</div>
                    <div class="stat-label">Selected</div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="controls">
            <div class="search-bar">
                <input type="text" id="searchInput" class="search-input"
                    placeholder="Search by name, description, or program address...">
            </div>
            <div class="filter-section">
                <span class="filter-label">Filter by:</span>
                <div class="filter-buttons" id="filterButtons"></div>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="action-bar">
            <div class="selection-info">
                <span id="selectionInfo">Select protocols to export their IDLs</span>
            </div>
            <div class="action-buttons">
                <button class="btn btn-secondary" id="selectAllBtn">Select All Visible</button>
                <button class="btn btn-secondary" id="clearBtn">Clear Selection</button>
                <button class="btn btn-primary" id="exportBtn" disabled>Export Selected IDLs</button>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="protocols-list" id="protocolsList">
            <div class="loading">
                <div class="spinner"></div>
                <p>Loading protocols...</p>
            </div>
        </div>

        <div class="footer">
            <p>idlhub.com - Open source IDL registry for the Solana ecosystem â€¢ <a href="https://github.com/openSVM/idlhub"
                    target="_blank">GitHub</a> â€¢ <a href="docs.html">Documentation</a></p>
            <p style="margin-top: 10px; font-size: 12px;">Contributions welcome! Help us complete missing IDLs.</p>
        </div>

        <!-- Individual Protocol Page View -->
        <div class="protocol-page" id="protocolPage">
            <button class="back-button" onclick="navigateHome()">Back to List</button>
            <div id="protocolPageContent"></div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Add IDL Modal -->
    <div class="modal-overlay" id="addIdlModal">
        <div class="modal">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <h2>â• Add New IDL</h2>
                <button class="modal-close" id="closeModal">Ã—</button>
            </div>
            <div class="modal-body">
                <div id="modalMessage"></div>
                
                <div class="modal-tabs">
                    <button class="modal-tab active" data-tab="upload">Upload JSON</button>
                    <button class="modal-tab" data-tab="url">From URL</button>
                    <button class="modal-tab" data-tab="github">From GitHub</button>
                </div>

                <!-- Upload Tab -->
                <div class="modal-tab-content active" id="uploadTab">
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="idlFile">Select IDL JSON File</label>
                        <input type="file" id="idlFile" accept=".json" />
                        <div class="form-hint">Upload a .json file containing the IDL definition</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="uploadProgramName">Program Name</label>
                        <input type="text" id="uploadProgramName" placeholder="e.g., Jupiter Aggregator" />
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="uploadProgramId">Program ID (Optional)</label>
                        <input type="text" id="uploadProgramId" placeholder="e.g., JUPyiwrYJFskUPiHa7hkeR8VUtAeFoSYbKedZNsDvCN" />
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- URL Tab -->
                <div class="modal-tab-content" id="urlTab">
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="idlUrl">IDL URL</label>
                        <input type="url" id="idlUrl" placeholder="https://example.com/path/to/idl.json" />
                        <div class="form-hint">Direct link to a JSON file containing the IDL</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <button type="button" class="btn-fetch" id="fetchUrlBtn" style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 16px; background: var(--accent-primary); color: white; border: none; cursor: pointer; font-size: 12px; font-weight: 600; font-family: inherit;">Fetch IDL from URL</button>
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="urlProgramName">Program Name</label>
                        <input type="text" id="urlProgramName" placeholder="e.g., Jupiter Aggregator" />
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="urlProgramId">Program ID (Optional)</label>
                        <input type="text" id="urlProgramId" placeholder="e.g., JUPyiwrYJFskUPiHa7hkeR8VUtAeFoSYbKedZNsDvCN" />
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- GitHub Tab -->
                <div class="modal-tab-content" id="githubTab">
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="githubOwner">GitHub Owner</label>
                        <input type="text" id="githubOwner" placeholder="e.g., jup-ag" />
                        <div class="form-hint">Repository owner or organization</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="githubRepo">Repository Name</label>
                        <input type="text" id="githubRepo" placeholder="e.g., jupiter-core" />
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="githubPath">Path to IDL (Optional)</label>
                        <input type="text" id="githubPath" placeholder="e.g., target/idl/jupiter.json" />
                        <div class="form-hint">Leave empty to auto-detect IDL files in the repository</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="githubBranch">Branch (Optional)</label>
                        <input type="text" id="githubBranch" placeholder="main" />
                        <div class="form-hint">Default: main</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <button type="button" class="btn-fetch" id="fetchGithubBtn" style="width: 100%; padding: 8px 16px; background: var(--accent-primary); color: white; border: none; cursor: pointer; font-size: 12px; font-weight: 600; font-family: inherit;">Fetch IDL from GitHub</button>
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="githubProgramName">Program Name</label>
                        <input type="text" id="githubProgramName" placeholder="e.g., Jupiter Aggregator" />
                    </div>
                    <div class="form-group">
                        <label for="githubProgramId">Program ID (Optional)</label>
                        <input type="text" id="githubProgramId" placeholder="e.g., JUPyiwrYJFskUPiHa7hkeR8VUtAeFoSYbKedZNsDvCN" />
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- IDL Preview -->
                <div id="idlPreview" style="display: none;" class="idl-preview">
                    <h3>IDL Preview</h3>
                    <div class="idl-stats" id="idlStats"></div>
                    <div class="idl-code" id="idlCode"></div>
                </div>

                <div class="form-actions">
                    <button type="button" class="btn-cancel" id="cancelBtn">Cancel</button>
                    <button type="button" class="btn-submit" id="submitIdl" disabled>Add IDL</button>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <script>
        let allProtocols = [];
        let filteredProtocols = [];
        let selectedProtocols = new Set();
        let bookmarkedProtocols = new Set();
        let currentCategory = 'all';
        let showingBookmarks = false;
        let keyboardFocusIndex = -1;
        let protocolAddressMap = {}; // Map program addresses to protocol IDs
        let currentTheme = 'light';

        // Theme management
        function loadTheme() {
            const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('idlhub-theme');
            if (savedTheme) {
                currentTheme = savedTheme;
            }
            applyTheme(currentTheme);
        }

        function applyTheme(theme) {
            currentTheme = theme;
            if (theme === 'light') {
                document.documentElement.removeAttribute('data-theme');
            } else {
                document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', theme);
            }
            updateThemeSelector();
        }

        function saveTheme(theme) {
            localStorage.setItem('idlhub-theme', theme);
            applyTheme(theme);
        }

        function updateThemeSelector() {
            const options = document.querySelectorAll('.theme-option');
            options.forEach(option => {
                if (option.dataset.theme === currentTheme) {
                    option.classList.add('selected');
                } else {
                    option.classList.remove('selected');
                }
            });
        }

        function toggleThemeDropdown() {
            const dropdown = document.getElementById('themeDropdown');
            dropdown.classList.toggle('active');
        }

        // Close dropdown when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            const themeSelector = document.querySelector('.theme-selector');
            const dropdown = document.getElementById('themeDropdown');
            if (themeSelector && !themeSelector.contains(e.target)) {
                dropdown.classList.remove('active');
            }
        });

        // Navigation functions
        function navigateHome() {
            window.location.hash = '';
        }

        function navigateToProtocol(protocolIdOrAddress) {
            window.location.hash = '#/' + protocolIdOrAddress;
        }

        // Handle hash-based routing
        function handleRoute() {
            const hash = window.location.hash;
            if (hash.startsWith('#/')) {
                const identifier = hash.substring(2);
                showProtocolPage(identifier);
            } else {
                showMainView();
            }
        }

        // Show main list view
        function showMainView() {
            document.querySelector('.container > div:not(.protocol-page)').style.display = 'block';
            document.getElementById('protocolPage').classList.remove('active');
        }

        // Show individual protocol page
        async function showProtocolPage(identifier) {
            // Hide main view
            document.querySelector('.container > div:not(.protocol-page)').style.display = 'none';

            // Find protocol by ID or address
            let protocol = allProtocols.find(p => p.id === identifier.toLowerCase());
            if (!protocol && protocolAddressMap[identifier]) {
                protocol = allProtocols.find(p => p.id === protocolAddressMap[identifier]);
            }

            if (!protocol) {
                document.getElementById('protocolPageContent').innerHTML = `
                    <div class="protocol-header-page">
                        <h2 class="protocol-title">Protocol Not Found</h2>
                        <p>Could not find protocol with identifier: ${identifier}</p>
                    </div>
                `;
                document.getElementById('protocolPage').classList.add('active');
                return;
            }

            // Load IDL
            try {
                const response = await fetch('./' + protocol.idlPath);
                const idl = await response.json();
                const programAddress = idl.metadata?.address || 'N/A';

                // Count instructions and accounts
                const instructionCount = idl.instructions?.length || 0;
                const accountCount = idl.accounts?.length || 0;
                const typeCount = idl.types?.length || 0;

                document.getElementById('protocolPageContent').innerHTML = `
                    <div class="protocol-header-page">
                        <h2 class="protocol-title">${protocol.name}</h2>
                        <p>${protocol.description}</p>
                        ${programAddress !== 'N/A' ? `
                            <div class="protocol-address">
                                <strong>Program Address:</strong> ${programAddress}
                            </div>
                        ` : ''}
                        <div class="protocol-stats-grid">
                            <div class="stat-box">
                                <div class="stat-box-label">Status</div>
                                <div class="stat-box-value">${protocol.status}</div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="stat-box">
                                <div class="stat-box-label">Category</div>
                                <div class="stat-box-value">${protocol.category}</div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="stat-box">
                                <div class="stat-box-label">Instructions</div>
                                <div class="stat-box-value">${instructionCount}</div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="stat-box">
                                <div class="stat-box-label">Accounts</div>
                                <div class="stat-box-value">${accountCount}</div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="stat-box">
                                <div class="stat-box-label">Types</div>
                                <div class="stat-box-value">${typeCount}</div>
                            </div>
                            <div class="stat-box">
                                <div class="stat-box-label">Version</div>
                                <div class="stat-box-value">${protocol.version}</div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        ${protocol.repo ? `
                            <p style="margin-top: 16px;">
                                <a href="${protocol.repo}" target="_blank" style="color: #0969da;">&lt;Repository&gt;</a>
                            </p>
                        ` : ''}
                    </div>
                    <div style="margin-top: 24px;">
                        <h3 style="margin-bottom: 12px; font-size: 16px;">IDL Data</h3>
                        <div class="idl-viewer">
                            <pre>${JSON.stringify(idl, null, 2)}</pre>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                `;
            } catch (error) {
                document.getElementById('protocolPageContent').innerHTML = `
                    <div class="protocol-header-page">
                        <h2 class="protocol-title">${protocol.name}</h2>
                        <p style="color: #cf222e;">Error loading IDL: ${error.message}</p>
                    </div>
                `;
            }

            document.getElementById('protocolPage').classList.add('active');
        }

        // Load bookmarks from localStorage
        function loadBookmarks() {
            const saved = localStorage.getItem('bookmarkedProtocols');
            if (saved) {
                bookmarkedProtocols = new Set(JSON.parse(saved));
            }
            updateBookmarkCount();
        }

        // Save bookmarks to localStorage
        function saveBookmarks() {
            localStorage.setItem('bookmarkedProtocols', JSON.stringify([...bookmarkedProtocols]));
            updateBookmarkCount();
        }

        // Toggle bookmark for a protocol
        function toggleBookmark(protocolId) {
            if (bookmarkedProtocols.has(protocolId)) {
                bookmarkedProtocols.delete(protocolId);
            } else {
                bookmarkedProtocols.add(protocolId);
            }
            saveBookmarks();
            renderProtocols();
        }

        // Update bookmark count in header
        function updateBookmarkCount() {
            const count = bookmarkedProtocols.size;
            const countElement = document.getElementById('bookmarkCount');
            if (count > 0) {
                countElement.textContent = `(${count})`;
                countElement.style.display = 'inline';
            } else {
                countElement.style.display = 'none';
            }
        }

        // Toggle showing bookmarks
        function toggleBookmarksView() {
            showingBookmarks = !showingBookmarks;
            const btn = document.getElementById('showBookmarksBtn');
            if (showingBookmarks) {
                btn.classList.add('active');
                document.getElementById('bookmarkBtnText').textContent = 'Show All';
                filteredProtocols = allProtocols.filter(p => bookmarkedProtocols.has(p.id));
            } else {
                btn.classList.remove('active');
                document.getElementById('bookmarkBtnText').textContent = 'Bookmarks';
                applyFilters();
            }
            renderProtocols();
        }

        // Load index.json and initialize
        async function init() {
            loadTheme();
            loadBookmarks();
            try {
                const response = await fetch('./index.json');
                const data = await response.json();
                allProtocols = data.protocols;
                filteredProtocols = allProtocols;

                // Build program address map
                await buildAddressMap();

                updateStats();
                renderFilters(data.categories);

                // Handle initial route
                handleRoute();

                // Only render protocols if on main view
                if (!window.location.hash.startsWith('#/')) {
                    renderProtocols();
                }

                setupEventListeners();
            } catch (error) {
                document.getElementById('protocolsList').innerHTML = `
                    <div class="no-results">
                        <h3>Failed to load protocols</h3>
                        <p>Error: ${error.message}</p>
                    </div>
                `;
            }
        }

        // Build map of program addresses to protocol IDs
        async function buildAddressMap() {
            for (const protocol of allProtocols) {
                try {
                    const response = await fetch('./' + protocol.idlPath);
                    const idl = await response.json();
                    if (idl.metadata?.address) {
                        protocolAddressMap[idl.metadata.address] = protocol.id;
                    }
                } catch (error) {
                    // Silently skip protocols with missing/invalid IDLs
                }
            }
        }

        function updateStats() {
            const available = allProtocols.filter(p => p.status === 'available').length;
            document.getElementById('totalProtocols').textContent = allProtocols.length;
            document.getElementById('availableProtocols').textContent = available;
            document.getElementById('selectedCount').textContent = selectedProtocols.size;
        }

        function renderFilters(categories) {
            const filterButtons = document.getElementById('filterButtons');

            const allBtn = document.createElement('button');
            allBtn.className = 'filter-btn active';
            allBtn.textContent = 'All';
            allBtn.dataset.category = 'all';
            filterButtons.appendChild(allBtn);

            categories.forEach(category => {
                const btn = document.createElement('button');
                btn.className = 'filter-btn';
                btn.textContent = category.split('-').map(w => w.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + w.slice(1)).join(' ');
                btn.dataset.category = category;
                filterButtons.appendChild(btn);
            });

            filterButtons.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                if (e.target.classList.contains('filter-btn')) {
                    document.querySelectorAll('.filter-btn').forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active'));
                    e.target.classList.add('active');
                    currentCategory = e.target.dataset.category;
                    applyFilters();
                }
            });
        }

        function applyFilters() {
            const searchTerm = document.getElementById('searchInput').value.toLowerCase();

            filteredProtocols = allProtocols.filter(protocol => {
                const matchesCategory = currentCategory === 'all' || protocol.category === currentCategory;
                const matchesSearch = searchTerm === '' ||
                    protocol.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ||
                    protocol.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ||
                    protocol.id.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) ||
                    // Check if search term matches a program address
                    Object.keys(protocolAddressMap).some(address =>
                        address.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm) &&
                        protocolAddressMap[address] === protocol.id
                    );

                return matchesCategory && matchesSearch;
            });

            renderProtocols();
        }

        function renderProtocols() {
            const container = document.getElementById('protocolsList');

            if (filteredProtocols.length === 0) {
                container.innerHTML = `
                    <div class="no-results">
                        <div class="no-results-icon">ğŸ”</div>
                        <h3>No protocols found</h3>
                        <p>Try adjusting your search or filters</p>
                    </div>
                `;
                return;
            }

            container.innerHTML = filteredProtocols.map(protocol => `
                <div class="protocol-item ${selectedProtocols.has(protocol.id) ? 'selected' : ''} ${bookmarkedProtocols.has(protocol.id) ? 'bookmarked' : ''}" data-id="${protocol.id}">
                    <input 
                        type="checkbox" 
                        class="protocol-checkbox" 
                        ${selectedProtocols.has(protocol.id) ? 'checked' : ''}
                        data-id="${protocol.id}"
                    >
                    <div class="protocol-info">
                        <div class="protocol-header">
                            <span class="protocol-name">${protocol.name}</span>
                            <span class="protocol-badge badge-${protocol.status}">${protocol.status}</span>
                            <span class="category-badge">${protocol.category}</span>
                        </div>
                        <div class="protocol-description">${protocol.description}</div>
                        <div class="protocol-meta">
                            ${protocol.repo ? `<a href="${protocol.repo}" target="_blank">Repository</a> â€¢ ` : ''}
                            Version ${protocol.version} â€¢ Updated ${protocol.lastUpdated}
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="protocol-actions">
                        <button class="bookmark-icon ${bookmarkedProtocols.has(protocol.id) ? 'bookmarked' : ''}" onclick="toggleBookmark('${protocol.id}')" title="Bookmark">
                            ${bookmarkedProtocols.has(protocol.id) ? 'â˜…' : 'â˜†'}
                        </button>
                        <button class="icon-btn" onclick="navigateToProtocol('${protocol.id}')" title="View IDL">View</button>
                        <button class="icon-btn" onclick="downloadSingle('${protocol.id}')" title="Download IDL">Download</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            `).join('');

            // Add click listeners to checkboxes
            document.querySelectorAll('.protocol-checkbox').forEach(checkbox => {
                checkbox.addEventListener('change', (e) => {
                    const id = e.target.dataset.id;
                    if (e.target.checked) {
                        selectedProtocols.add(id);
                    } else {
                        selectedProtocols.delete(id);
                    }
                    updateSelection();
                });
            });

            // Add click listeners to protocol items
            document.querySelectorAll('.protocol-item').forEach(item => {
                item.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                    if (e.target.classList.contains('protocol-checkbox') ||
                        e.target.classList.contains('icon-btn') ||
                        e.target.classList.contains('bookmark-icon') ||
                        e.target.tagName === 'A') {
                        return;
                    }
                    const checkbox = item.querySelector('.protocol-checkbox');
                    checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked;
                    checkbox.dispatchEvent(new Event('change'));
                });
            });
        }

        function updateSelection() {
            updateStats();
            document.getElementById('exportBtn').disabled = selectedProtocols.size === 0;

            if (selectedProtocols.size > 0) {
                document.getElementById('selectionInfo').textContent =
                    `${selectedProtocols.size} protocol${selectedProtocols.size > 1 ? 's' : ''} selected`;
            } else {
                document.getElementById('selectionInfo').textContent = 'Select protocols to export their IDLs';
            }

            // Update visual state
            document.querySelectorAll('.protocol-item').forEach(item => {
                const id = item.dataset.id;
                if (selectedProtocols.has(id)) {
                    item.classList.add('selected');
                } else {
                    item.classList.remove('selected');
                }
            });
        }

        // Copy Rules for AI Agents
        async function copyRulesToClipboard() {
            const rulesText = `# IDLHub Usage Rules for AI Agents

## What is IDLHub?

IDLHub (https://idlhub.com) is a comprehensive registry of Solana program Interface Definition Language (IDL) files. It provides:
- A searchable web interface to browse and export IDLs
- REST API for programmatic access
- GitHub integration for loading IDLs
- Semantic search capabilities

## Web Interface (https://idlhub.com)

The main page provides:
1. **Search**: Search by program name, description, or address
2. **Filters**: Filter by categories (DeFi, DEX, Lending, NFT, etc.)
3. **Selection**: Select multiple programs and export their IDLs
4. **Bookmarks**: Save favorite programs for quick access
5. **Themes**: Multiple color themes for comfortable viewing

### How to Use:
- Browse the list of Solana programs with IDLs
- Click on any program to view full details
- Select programs using checkboxes
- Click "Export Selected IDLs" to download as JSON
- Use search to find specific programs
- Filter by category to narrow results

## REST API (https://idlhub.com/api)

### Quick Start Examples:

**List all IDLs:**
` + '```' + `bash
curl "https://idlhub.com/api/idl?network=mainnet&limit=10"
` + '```' + `

**Get specific IDL:**
` + '```' + `bash
curl "https://idlhub.com/api/idl/JUPyiwrYJFskUPiHa7hkeR8VUtAeFoSYbKedZNsDvCN"
` + '```' + `

**Search IDLs:**
` + '```' + `bash
curl "https://idlhub.com/api/idl/search?q=jupiter+swap&network=mainnet"
` + '```' + `

**Load IDL from GitHub:**
` + '```' + `bash
curl -X POST "https://idlhub.com/api/idl/load-from-github" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"owner":"coral-xyz","repo":"anchor","path":"tests/example-program/idl.json","programId":"ExampleProgram11111111111111111111111111111","name":"Example Program","network":"mainnet"}'
` + '```' + `

### API Endpoints:

| Method | Endpoint | Description |
|--------|----------|-------------|
| GET | /api/idl | List all IDLs |
| GET | /api/idl/:programId | Get specific IDL |
| POST | /api/idl/upload | Upload new IDL |
| POST | /api/idl/load-from-github | Load IDL from GitHub |
| GET | /api/idl/search | Search IDLs |
| DELETE | /api/idl/:programId | Delete IDL |

### Query Parameters:
- ` + '`' + `network` + '`' + `: mainnet/devnet/testnet (default: mainnet)
- ` + '`' + `limit` + '`' + `: Results per page (1-100, default: 50)
- ` + '`' + `offset` + '`' + `: Pagination offset
- ` + '`' + `q` + '`' + `: Search query (for search endpoint)

## Data Structure

### IDL Format (Anchor Framework):
` + '```' + `json
{
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "name": "program_name",
  "instructions": [
    {
      "name": "instruction_name",
      "accounts": [...],
      "args": [...]
    }
  ],
  "accounts": [...],
  "types": [...],
  "errors": [...]
}
` + '```' + `

### Program Metadata:
` + '```' + `json
{
  "programId": "Base58EncodedAddress...",
  "name": "Program Name",
  "network": "mainnet",
  "instructionCount": 25,
  "createdAt": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",
  "idl": { ... }
}
` + '```' + `

## When to Use IDLHub:

1. **Building Solana dApps**: Get IDLs to interact with programs
2. **Program Analysis**: Study instruction patterns across protocols
3. **Documentation**: Generate docs from IDL definitions
4. **Testing**: Use IDLs to create test fixtures
5. **Discovery**: Find similar programs or protocols

## Best Practices:

1. **Always specify network**: Use ` + '`' + `network=mainnet` + '`' + ` or ` + '`' + `network=devnet` + '`' + `
2. **Use pagination**: Don't fetch all data at once
3. **Cache responses**: IDLs don't change frequently
4. **Validate program IDs**: Must be valid base58 Solana addresses (32-44 chars)
5. **Handle errors**: Check response status and error messages

## Examples for Common Tasks:

### Task: Find all DEX programs
1. Go to https://idlhub.com
2. Click "DEX" filter button
3. Browse results or select and export

### Task: Get Jupiter IDL programmatically
` + '```' + `javascript
const response = await fetch(
  'https://idlhub.com/api/idl/JUPyiwrYJFskUPiHa7hkeR8VUtAeFoSYbKedZNsDvCN'
);
const { idl } = await response.json();
` + '```' + `

### Task: Search for lending protocols
` + '```' + `javascript
const response = await fetch(
  'https://idlhub.com/api/idl/search?q=lending&network=mainnet'
);
const { results } = await response.json();
` + '```' + `

## Additional Resources:

- **Full Documentation**: https://idlhub.com/docs.html
- **API Guide for Agents**: https://idlhub.com/llms.txt
- **GitHub Repository**: https://github.com/openSVM/idlhub
- **Quick Install**: \`curl -fsSL https://idlhub.com/mcp | sh\`

## Notes:

- No authentication required (currently)
- Data stored in OpenSVM backend
- Supports mainnet, devnet, and testnet
- Regular updates from community contributions
- Open source and community-driven

---

Use these instructions to help users interact with IDLHub effectively. The service provides both human-friendly web UI and machine-friendly API access to Solana program IDLs.

## API Endpoints:

- List all programs: ` + '`' + `GET /api/programs` + '`' + `
- Get IDL for a program: ` + '`' + `GET /api/programs/:id/idl` + '`' + `
- Add a new program: ` + '`' + `POST /api/programs` + '`' + `
- Update IDL for a program: ` + '`' + `PUT /api/programs/:id/idl` + '`' + `
- Delete a program: ` + '`' + `DELETE /api/programs/:id` + '`' + `

(Replace ` + '`' + `:id` + '`' + ` with the actual program ID)
`;
            try {
                await navigator.clipboard.writeText(rulesText);
                const btn = document.getElementById('copyRulesBtn');
                const originalText = btn.innerHTML;
                btn.innerHTML = '<span>âœ… Copied!</span>';
                setTimeout(() => {
                    btn.innerHTML = originalText;
                }, 2000);
            } catch (err) {
                console.error('Failed to copy:', err);
                alert('Failed to copy to clipboard. Please try again.');
            }
        }

        // Add IDL Modal Functionality
        let currentIdlData = null;
        let currentTab = 'upload';

        function openAddIdlModal() {
            document.getElementById('addIdlModal').classList.add('active');
            resetModal();
        }

        function closeAddIdlModal() {
            document.getElementById('addIdlModal').classList.remove('active');
            resetModal();
        }

        function resetModal() {
            // Clear all inputs
            document.getElementById('idlFile').value = '';
            document.getElementById('uploadProgramName').value = '';
            document.getElementById('uploadProgramId').value = '';
            document.getElementById('idlUrl').value = '';
            document.getElementById('urlProgramName').value = '';
            document.getElementById('urlProgramId').value = '';
            document.getElementById('githubOwner').value = '';
            document.getElementById('githubRepo').value = '';
            document.getElementById('githubPath').value = '';
            document.getElementById('githubBranch').value = '';
            document.getElementById('githubProgramName').value = '';
            document.getElementById('githubProgramId').value = '';
            
            // Hide preview
            document.getElementById('idlPreview').style.display = 'none';
            
            // Reset submit button state
            const submitBtn = document.getElementById('submitIdl');
            submitBtn.disabled = true;
            
            // Clear message
            document.getElementById('modalMessage').innerHTML = '';
            
            // Reset to first tab
            switchTab('upload');
            currentIdlData = null;
        }

        function switchTab(tabName) {
            currentTab = tabName;
            
            // Update tab buttons
            document.querySelectorAll('.modal-tab').forEach(tab => {
                tab.classList.remove('active');
            });
            document.querySelector(`[data-tab="${tabName}"]`).classList.add('active');
            
            // Update tab content
            document.querySelectorAll('.modal-tab-content').forEach(content => {
                content.classList.remove('active');
            });
            document.getElementById(`${tabName}Tab`).classList.add('active');
            
            // Hide preview when switching tabs
            document.getElementById('idlPreview').style.display = 'none';
            document.getElementById('submitIdl').disabled = true;
            currentIdlData = null;
        }

        function showMessage(message, type = 'error') {
            const messageDiv = document.getElementById('modalMessage');
            const wrapper = document.createElement('div');
            wrapper.className = `${type}-message`;
            wrapper.textContent = message;
            messageDiv.textContent = '';
            messageDiv.appendChild(wrapper);
            setTimeout(() => {
                messageDiv.textContent = '';
            }, 5000);
        }

        function parseIdlStats(idl) {
            const stats = {
                instructions: idl.instructions?.length || 0,
                accounts: idl.accounts?.length || 0,
                types: idl.types?.length || 0,
                errors: idl.errors?.length || 0
            };
            return stats;
        }

        function showIdlPreview(idl) {
            currentIdlData = idl;
            const stats = parseIdlStats(idl);
            
            // Show stats
            const statsHtml = `
                <div class="idl-stat">
                    <div class="idl-stat-label">Instructions</div>
                    <div class="idl-stat-value">${stats.instructions}</div>
                </div>
                <div class="idl-stat">
                    <div class="idl-stat-label">Accounts</div>
                    <div class="idl-stat-value">${stats.accounts}</div>
                </div>
                <div class="idl-stat">
                    <div class="idl-stat-label">Types</div>
                    <div class="idl-stat-value">${stats.types}</div>
                </div>
                <div class="idl-stat">
                    <div class="idl-stat-label">Errors</div>
                    <div class="idl-stat-value">${stats.errors}</div>
                </div>
            `;
            document.getElementById('idlStats').innerHTML = statsHtml;
            
            // Show code with syntax highlighting (basic)
            const codeHtml = syntaxHighlight(JSON.stringify(idl, null, 2));
            document.getElementById('idlCode').innerHTML = codeHtml;
            
            // Show preview section
            document.getElementById('idlPreview').style.display = 'block';
            document.getElementById('submitIdl').disabled = false;
        }

        function syntaxHighlight(json) {
            json = json.replace(/&/g, '&amp;').replace(/</g, '&lt;').replace(/>/g, '&gt;');
            return json.replace(/("(\\u[a-zA-Z0-9]{4}|\\[^u]|[^\\"])*"(\s*:)?|\b(true|false|null)\b|-?\d+(?:\.\d*)?(?:[eE][+\-]?\d+)?)/g, function (match) {
                let cls = 'number';
                if (/^"/.test(match)) {
                    if (/:$/.test(match)) {
                        cls = 'key';
                        return '<span style="color: var(--accent-primary); font-weight: 600;">' + match + '</span>';
                    } else {
                        cls = 'string';
                        return '<span style="color: #2da44e;">' + match + '</span>';
                    }
                } else if (/true|false/.test(match)) {
                    return '<span style="color: #0969da;">' + match + '</span>';
                } else if (/null/.test(match)) {
                    return '<span style="color: #8b949e;">' + match + '</span>';
                }
                return '<span style="color: #cf222e;">' + match + '</span>';
            });
        }

        // Handle file upload
        async function handleFileUpload(event) {
            const file = event.target.files[0];
            if (!file) return;
            
            try {
                const text = await file.text();
                const idl = JSON.parse(text);
                showIdlPreview(idl);
            } catch (error) {
                showMessage('Invalid JSON file. Please upload a valid IDL JSON file.', 'error');
            }
        }

        // Handle URL fetch
        async function handleUrlFetch() {
            const urlInput = document.getElementById('idlUrl').value.trim();
            if (!urlInput) {
                showMessage('Please enter a URL', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            // Validate URL format
            let url;
            try {
                url = new URL(urlInput);
            } catch (e) {
                showMessage('Invalid URL format. Please enter a valid URL.', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            // Only allow HTTPS and GitHub raw URLs for security
            const allowedDomains = ['raw.githubusercontent.com', 'gist.githubusercontent.com'];
            const isGitHub = allowedDomains.some(domain => url.hostname === domain);
            const isHttps = url.protocol === 'https:';
            
            if (!isHttps && !isGitHub) {
                showMessage('Only HTTPS URLs are allowed for security reasons.', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                showMessage('Fetching IDL from URL...', 'loading');
                const response = await fetch(url.href);
                if (!response.ok) {
                    throw new Error('Failed to fetch IDL');
                }
                
                // Check response size (limit to 5MB)
                const contentLength = response.headers.get('content-length');
                if (contentLength && parseInt(contentLength) > 5 * 1024 * 1024) {
                    throw new Error('File too large (max 5MB)');
                }
                
                const idl = await response.json();
                document.getElementById('modalMessage').innerHTML = '';
                showIdlPreview(idl);
            } catch (error) {
                showMessage('Failed to fetch IDL from URL. Please check the URL and try again. ' + error.message, 'error');
            }
        }

        // Handle GitHub fetch
        async function handleGithubFetch() {
            const owner = document.getElementById('githubOwner').value.trim();
            const repo = document.getElementById('githubRepo').value.trim();
            const path = document.getElementById('githubPath').value.trim();
            const branch = document.getElementById('githubBranch').value.trim() || 'main';
            
            if (!owner || !repo) {
                showMessage('Please enter GitHub owner and repository name', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                showMessage('Fetching IDL from GitHub...', 'loading');
                
                // If path is provided, fetch directly
                if (path) {
                    const url = `https://raw.githubusercontent.com/${encodeURIComponent(owner)}/${encodeURIComponent(repo)}/${encodeURIComponent(branch)}/${encodeURIComponent(path)}`;
                    const response = await fetch(url);
                    if (!response.ok) {
                        throw new Error('Failed to fetch IDL');
                    }
                    const idl = await response.json();
                    document.getElementById('modalMessage').innerHTML = '';
                    showIdlPreview(idl);
                } else {
                    // Auto-detect IDL files
                    showMessage('Auto-detection not implemented yet. Please provide the path to the IDL file.', 'error');
                }
            } catch (error) {
                showMessage('Failed to fetch IDL from GitHub. Please check your inputs and try again.', 'error');
            }
        }

        // Submit IDL
        async function submitIdl() {
            if (!currentIdlData) {
                showMessage('Please load an IDL first', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            let programName, programId;
            
            if (currentTab === 'upload') {
                programName = document.getElementById('uploadProgramName').value.trim();
                programId = document.getElementById('uploadProgramId').value.trim();
            } else if (currentTab === 'url') {
                programName = document.getElementById('urlProgramName').value.trim();
                programId = document.getElementById('urlProgramId').value.trim();
            } else if (currentTab === 'github') {
                programName = document.getElementById('githubProgramName').value.trim();
                programId = document.getElementById('githubProgramId').value.trim();
            }
            
            if (!programName) {
                showMessage('Please enter a program name', 'error');
                return;
            }
            
            try {
                document.getElementById('submitIdl').disabled = true;
                showMessage('Submitting IDL...', 'loading');
                
                // Here you would call your API to submit the IDL
                // For now, we'll just show success
                const payload = {
                    programId: programId || currentIdlData.metadata?.address || 'unknown',
                    name: programName,
                    network: 'mainnet',
                    idl: currentIdlData
                };
                
                // Real API call
                const response = await fetch('/api/submit-idl', {
                    method: 'POST',
                    headers: {
                        'Content-Type': 'application/json'
                    },
                    body: JSON.stringify(payload)
                });
                if (response.ok) {
                    showMessage('IDL submitted successfully! The registry will be updated shortly.', 'success');
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        closeAddIdlModal();
                    }, 2000);
                } else {
                    const errorText = await response.text();
                    showMessage('Failed to submit IDL: ' + errorText, 'error');
                    document.getElementById('submitIdl').disabled = false;
                }
                
            } catch (error) {
                showMessage('Failed to submit IDL. Please try again.', 'error');
                document.getElementById('submitIdl').disabled = false;
            }
        }

        function setupEventListeners() {
            document.getElementById('searchInput').addEventListener('input', applyFilters);

            document.getElementById('showBookmarksBtn').addEventListener('click', toggleBookmarksView);

            document.getElementById('copyRulesBtn').addEventListener('click', copyRulesToClipboard);

            // Add IDL Modal
            document.getElementById('addIdlBtn').addEventListener('click', openAddIdlModal);
            document.getElementById('closeModal').addEventListener('click', closeAddIdlModal);
            document.getElementById('cancelBtn').addEventListener('click', closeAddIdlModal);
            
            // Modal tabs
            document.querySelectorAll('.modal-tab').forEach(tab => {
                tab.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                    switchTab(e.target.dataset.tab);
                });
            });
            
            // File upload
            document.getElementById('idlFile').addEventListener('change', handleFileUpload);
            
            // URL fetch button
            document.getElementById('fetchUrlBtn').addEventListener('click', handleUrlFetch);
            
            // GitHub fetch button
            document.getElementById('fetchGithubBtn').addEventListener('click', handleGithubFetch);
            
            // Submit button
            document.getElementById('submitIdl').addEventListener('click', submitIdl);
            
            // Close modal on overlay click
            document.getElementById('addIdlModal').addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (e.target === this) {
                    closeAddIdlModal();
                }
            });
            
            // Close modal on ESC key
            document.addEventListener('keydown', function(e) {
                const modal = document.getElementById('addIdlModal');
                if (e.key === 'Escape' && modal.classList.contains('active')) {
                    closeAddIdlModal();
                }
            });

            // Theme selector
            document.getElementById('themeBtn').addEventListener('click', toggleThemeDropdown);
            
            document.querySelectorAll('.theme-option').forEach(option => {
                option.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                    const theme = e.target.dataset.theme;
                    saveTheme(theme);
                    document.getElementById('themeDropdown').classList.remove('active');
                });
            });

            document.getElementById('selectAllBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
                filteredProtocols.forEach(p => selectedProtocols.add(p.id));
                updateSelection();
                renderProtocols();
            });

            document.getElementById('clearBtn').addEventListener('click', () => {
                selectedProtocols.clear();
                updateSelection();
                renderProtocols();
            });

            document.getElementById('exportBtn').addEventListener('click', exportSelectedIDLs);

            // Hash change listener for routing
            window.addEventListener('hashchange', handleRoute);

            // Keyboard navigation
            document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyboardNavigation);
        }

        // Keyboard navigation handler
        function handleKeyboardNavigation(e) {
            // Only handle keyboard nav on main view
            if (document.getElementById('protocolPage').classList.contains('active')) {
                if (e.key === 'Escape') {
                    navigateHome();
                }
                return;
            }

            const items = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.protocol-item'));
            if (items.length === 0) return;

            switch (e.key) {
                case 'ArrowDown':
                    e.preventDefault();
                    keyboardFocusIndex = Math.min(keyboardFocusIndex + 1, items.length - 1);
                    updateKeyboardFocus(items);
                    break;
                case 'ArrowUp':
                    e.preventDefault();
                    keyboardFocusIndex = Math.max(keyboardFocusIndex - 1, 0);
                    updateKeyboardFocus(items);
                    break;
                case 'Enter':
                    e.preventDefault();
                    if (keyboardFocusIndex >= 0 && keyboardFocusIndex < items.length) {
                        const protocolId = items[keyboardFocusIndex].dataset.id;
                        navigateToProtocol(protocolId);
                    }
                    break;
                case 'Escape':
                    e.preventDefault();
                    keyboardFocusIndex = -1;
                    updateKeyboardFocus(items);
                    break;
                case ' ':
                    // Space to select/deselect
                    if (keyboardFocusIndex >= 0 && keyboardFocusIndex < items.length) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        const checkbox = items[keyboardFocusIndex].querySelector('.protocol-checkbox');
                        checkbox.checked = !checkbox.checked;
                        checkbox.dispatchEvent(new Event('change'));
                    }
                    break;
            }
        }

        function updateKeyboardFocus(items) {
            items.forEach((item, index) => {
                if (index === keyboardFocusIndex) {
                    item.classList.add('keyboard-focus');
                    item.scrollIntoView({ block: 'nearest', behavior: 'smooth' });
                } else {
                    item.classList.remove('keyboard-focus');
                }
            });
        }

        async function viewIDL(protocolId) {
            const protocol = allProtocols.find(p => p.id === protocolId);
            if (!protocol) return;

            try {
                const response = await fetch('./' + protocol.idlPath);
                const idl = await response.json();

                const newWindow = window.open('', '_blank');
                newWindow.document.write(`
                    <html>
                        <head>
                            <title>${protocol.name} IDL</title>
                            <style>
                                body { font-family: monospace; padding: 20px; background: #1e1e1e; color: #d4d4d4; }
                                pre { white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; }
                            </style>
                        </head>
                        <body>
                            <h1>${protocol.name} IDL</h1>
                            <pre>${JSON.stringify(idl, null, 2)}</pre>
                        </body>
                    </html>
                `);
            } catch (error) {
                alert(`Failed to load IDL: ${error.message}`);
            }
        }

        async function downloadSingle(protocolId) {
            const protocol = allProtocols.find(p => p.id === protocolId);
            if (!protocol) return;

            try {
                const response = await fetch('./' + protocol.idlPath);
                const idl = await response.json();

                const blob = new Blob([JSON.stringify(idl, null, 2)], { type: 'application/json' });
                const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
                const a = document.createElement('a');
                a.href = url;
                a.download = `${protocol.id}-idl.json`;
                a.click();
                URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
            } catch (error) {
                alert(`Failed to download IDL: ${error.message}`);
            }
        }

        async function exportSelectedIDLs() {
            if (selectedProtocols.size === 0) return;

            const idls = {};
            const errors = [];

            for (const protocolId of selectedProtocols) {
                const protocol = allProtocols.find(p => p.id === protocolId);
                if (!protocol) continue;

                try {
                    const response = await fetch('./' + protocol.idlPath);
                    const idl = await response.json();
                    idls[protocolId] = idl;
                } catch (error) {
                    errors.push(`${protocol.name}: ${error.message}`);
                }
            }

            if (errors.length > 0) {
                alert(`Warning: Some IDLs failed to load:\n${errors.join('\n')}`);
            }

            const exportData = {
                exportedAt: new Date().toISOString(),
                totalProtocols: selectedProtocols.size,
                protocols: idls
            };

            const blob = new Blob([JSON.stringify(exportData, null, 2)], { type: 'application/json' });
            const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
            const a = document.createElement('a');
            a.href = url;
            a.download = `solana-idls-export-${new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]}.json`;
            a.click();
            URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
        }

        // Initialize on page load
        init();
    </script>
</body>

</html>

```

## File: index.json

      "version": "0.1.0",
      "lastUpdated": "2025-10-09"
